verses.verse: And in <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H802>women<s%> shall take <S%H2388>hold<s%> of <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> We will <S%H398>eat<s%> our own <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H3847>wear<s%> our own <S%H8071>apparel:<s%> <S%H7535>only<s%> let us be <S%H7121>called<s%> by thy <S%H8034>name,<s%> to <S%H622>take<s%> away our <S%H2781>reproach.<s%>

In <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H6780>branch<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H6643>beautiful<s%> and <S%H3519>glorious,<s%> and the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall be <S%H1347>excellent<s%> and <S%H8597>comely<s%> for them that are <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> that he that is <S%H7604>left<s%> in <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and he that <S%H3498>remaineth<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> shall be <S%H559>called<s%> <S%H6918>holy,<s%> even every <S%H3605>one<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> among the <S%H2416>living<s%> in Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%>

When <S%H518><s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> shall have washed <S%H7364>away<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6675>filth<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and shall have <S%H1740>purged<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> from the <S%H4480>midst<s%> <S%H7130><s%> thereof by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> and by the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H1197>burning.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H1254>create<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> dwelling <S%H4349>place<s%> of <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H5921>upon<s%> her <S%H4744>assemblies,<s%> a <S%H6051>cloud<s%> and <S%H6227>smoke<s%> by <S%H3119>day,<s%> and the <S%H5051>shining<s%> of a <S%H3852>flaming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> by <S%H3915>night:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> shall be a <S%H2646>defense.<s%>

And there shall <S%H1961>be<s%> a <S%H5521>tabernacle<s%> for a <S%H6738>shadow<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime<s%> from the <S%H4480>heat,<s%> <S%H2721><s%> and for a place of <S%H4268>refuge,<s%> and for a <S%H4563>covert<s%> from <S%H4480>storm<s%> <S%H2230><s%> and from <S%H4480>rain.<s%> <S%H4306><s%>
